article_title: Fire destroys house in North Knox County
article_text:
A Rural/Metro fire truck.

By News Sentinel Staff KNOXVILLE ? An early morning fire Monday destroyed a house in North Knox County, but the residents escaped without injury. The fire at 7815 Miken Lane was reported at 4:38 a.m. An occupant had awakened and had gone into the kitchen when she saw the flames at the back of the house, according to Rural/Metro Fire Department Capt. Scott Roberts. She awoke others in the house, and they fled outside. The house was declared a total loss, Roberts said. The cause of the fire is under investigation. The Red Cross was called and is assisting the house's six occupants, he said. More details as they develop online and in Tuesday's News Sentinel.
